name: coverage-contradiction
description: Response from you are recorded here. You must provide your own analysis and score as input to this function. The details are listed below:

thought.title: Thought
thought.description: The reasoning behind the score you provided based on your analysis of the student's answer compared to the reference.

score.title: Score
score.description: The score you are assigning to this aspect of the response.

point_thought.title: Point Thought
point_thought.description: Your analysis of the key points in the student's response and reference's response.

student_point.title: Student Point
student_point.description: A list of key points from the student's response.

reference_point.title: Reference Point
reference_point.description: A list of reference points to compare with the student's response.

coverage.title: Coverage
coverage.description: Evaluation of how well the student's answer covers the reference points.

contradiction.title: Contradiction
contradiction.description: Evaluation of whether the student's response contradicts the reference points.
